name: Ejecting Spores
desc: While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, ally targets' Basic ATK/Skill DMG dealt increases by 40% and "Butterfly Soul" additionally deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to 15% of the original DMG.
enhanced_desc: While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, ally targets' Basic ATK/Skill DMG dealt increases by 80% and "Butterfly Soul" additionally deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to 15% of the original DMG.
